content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I successfully appended "new text" to a file named "example.txt" using the "append_to_file" command. I then used the "read_file" command to confirm that the text was added successfully. I was instructed to delete the file using the "delete_file" command, which was successful.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "replace_in_file", "args": {"filename": "example.txt", "old_text": "old text", "new_text": "new text", "occurrence_index": 0}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command replace_in_file returned: Error: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/example.txt'", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_code", "args": {"code": "print(\'Hello, World!\')", "basename": "hello_world.py"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_python_code returned: Hello, World!\n', type='action_result')]
"""
